pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Fixing paths related issues on Windows build.

content.raw: Thank @scpeters , I noticed a few test failure reported there. Anything I should pay attentions? I saw some are caused by test timeout \(For example, INTEGRATION\_model\_database and INTEGRATION\_worlds\_installed\). Are they just transient issues to ignore?
content.html: Thank @scpeters , I noticed a few test failure reported there. Anything I should pay attentions? I saw some are caused by test timeout (For example, INTEGRATION_model_database and INTEGRATION_worlds_installed). Are they just transient issues to ignore?
